channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk Alarm and Events Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk Alarm and Events Server

item.title: CVE-2022-38744|2024-08-03T11:02:14.533Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20alarm%20and%20events%20server
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker with network access to a victim's Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk Alarm and Events service could open a connection, causing the service to fault and become unavailable. The affected port could be used as a server ping port and uses messages structured with XML.
